::Astral::

Astral nods. "He'll let ya in, don't worry."

He checks his scanners for Zardus's location and then changes course, 
heading for the bridge.

"Here, follow me, we'll get to him shortly."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Symphony::

to

hoped this
> was true.
> 
>        "Nice place....Good shields........I think I'll like it 
here, that
> is, if your leader, Zardus, lets me in," Composer said.
